amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new subparagraph within paragraph 2 to provide for oil and gas leasing of any Federal lands that have a high concentration of orphaned oil and gas wells.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the Secretary of Energy from approving new oil and gas leases on Federal lands that have high concentrations of orphaned oil and gas wells.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 230 (Roll no. 84).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Castro (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A063) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 230 (Roll no. 84).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
